author: MIKE SILVERMAN
title: Met opera launches 10th HD season
text:
Marty Sohl Met opera launches 10th HD season 
In this Sept. 16, 2015 photo released by the Metropolitan Opera, soprano Anna Netrebko, right, and baritone Dmitri Hvorostovsky perform in a scene from Verdi's "Il Trovatore" at the Metropolitan Opera in New York. The Metropolitan Opera is kicking off its 10th season of live HD broadcasts this Saturday with Verdi's “Il Trovatore." (Marty Sohl/Metropolitan Opera via AP) Posted: Thursday, October 1, 2015 6:55 am | Updated: 10:00 am, Thu Oct 1, 2015. Met opera launches 10th HD season Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) — The Metropolitan Opera is kicking off its 10th season of live HD broadcasts this Saturday with Verdi's "Il Trovatore" starring — who else? — Anna Netrebko. 
The Russian diva, one of the Met's top box-office draws, will be headlining her 12th HD show, more than any other lead performer.
